name: Dr. Emily Carter
bio: Dr. Emily is a certified veterinarian who specializes in animal nutrition and preventive healthcare. Her compassionate approach and deep understanding of pet behavior make her one of the most trusted experts in the field.

name: James Anderson
bio: James is an expert in obedience and behavior training for all breeds. His gentle, reward-based techniques help dogs build confidence and trust with their owners.

name: Sophia Kim
bio: Sophia brings creativity and care to every grooming session. Her special winter grooming treatments help pets stay clean, healthy, and comfortable through the cold months.

name: Dr. Rajiv Patel
bio: Dr. Patel focuses on customized meal planning for pets to enhance their immunity and energy levels â€” especially during seasonal changes like winter.

name: Hannah Lee
bio: Hannah helps pets overcome anxiety, fear, and separation stress through behavior therapy and positive reinforcement training.

name: Michael Torres
bio: Michael manages safe, comfortable, and fun boarding environments for pets. He ensures every furry guest gets love, attention, and exercise daily.
